did.unittitle: Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner marriage certificate
did.abstract: Marriage certificate of Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner of Troy, New York, dated September 7, 1809.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner marriage certificate, 1977.103, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Marriage certificate of Hezekiah Williams and Mary Gardner of Troy, New York, dated September 7, 1809. The certificate is signed by both Williams and Gardner, as well as several witnesses to the wedding ceremony. Williams and Gardner were both Quakers.
